name: Stars io
description:
Control most stars to win the game. Your stars automatically produce fleet, use it to conquer stars. 

Sending will always send 50% of the current fleet.

Bigger stars produce more fleet, try to control them.

Controls:

- LMB Rectangle Select to select your fleet

- RMB Rectangle Select to send your fleet

- WASD or Arrow keys to move arround

- Mouse scroll to zoom

The AI is as stupid as you can imagine and doesn't cheat, yet it's almost unbeatable. 

Some might say its ability to control multiple units gives it an Unfair Advantage.

GitHub URL: https://github.com/gajop/bevy-jam-1
